Row.Text: Welcome to the land of Equestria! Is there is anything you wish to ask?
Oh! As always, I am fascinated to meet new faces. How can I help you?
Blunt force and Chaos can only last for so long. I shall see how long yours will last.
Harmony, lost. I only worry for future of my little ponies and peoples of Equestria has to endure without me.
While we do love friendly approach, it would be nice if we can have some space.
We would appreciate if you can direct your attention to somewhere else.
Was there any good reason we need to talk?
What a beautiful day, isn't it?
Welcome! My friend. Is there anything you wish to talk about?
May I ask what are you planning to do? I hope your reason is not what I think. Because if it is...
This will be a fulfilling trade for our, and your citizen as well.
Wouldn't be nice if our citizen can share their friendship?
We must unite in this age of darkness against chaos, will you help us?
I won't let you ravage harmony in your whim! Stand down.
Harmony, is the way ponies and people should live.
Finally, we can return to usual, and peaceful day at last.
This is it. We are sick of your atypical measure. BE PREPARED!
Is there any reason or point on doing this? I am not angry. I am just very dissapointed.
Octavia
Vinyl Scratch
Twilight Sparkle
Luna of Equestria
